description: people working in a field; standing woman, LRC, holding a basket, in profile from left; squatting woman in LLC; three figures at center including seated man and man with three barrels; trees in URQ at horizon line
portfolio: From Les Bois du Monde Illustré (plate 629)
provenance: [Catherine E. Burns, Oakland, CA, until 1996; sold in April for IRT, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1996-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in pencil and in the print: [A Lepere]
title: The Grape Harvest at Andresy
